document.heading: District of Columbia Historic Rhodes Tavern Preservation Initiative of 1982

history.narrative: Law 5-69, the “District of Columbia Historic Rhodes Tavern Preservation Initiative of 1982,” was submitted to the electors of the District of Columbia on November 8, 1983, as Initiative No. 11. The results of the voting, certified by the Board of Elections and Ethics on November 21, 1983, were 22, 977 for the Initiative and 15,420 against the Initiative. It was transmitted to Congress on January 24, 1984, published in the D.C. Register on February 3, 1984, and became law on March 15, 1984.
